articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Posts
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Posts
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected a civil police post under KPA Unit 171 and a post of the third company of the second battalion under the unit guarding the forefront.
					 The first leg of his inspection was the civil police post.
					
					 At the observation post he watched the enemy's position facing the post and learned in detail about the enemy situation.
					
					 He highly praised the servicemen for always keeping themselves fully combat ready.
					
					 He noted that the Korean revolution is making triumphant progress, foiling the moves of the reactionaries at home and abroad thanks to the unknown efforts and warm patriotism of the frontline soldiers standing guard over the defence line of the country as firm as an iron wall. 
					
					 "All the servicemen of the post standing in fierce confrontation with the enemy despite rain or snow and whether they are known or unknown are patriots", he said, instructing them to further tighten their frontline guard duty as required by the prevailing situation, always remembering the expectation of the party, the revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 He underscored the need for them to fully prepare themselves politically and ideologically and in military technique so as to beat back any surprise invasion by the enemy.
					
					 To do so it is important to have strong faith and optimism that the socialist cause is sure to triumph and arm themselves with the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. class consciousness, he stressed.
					
					 He went round a bedroom, mess hall and daily food store of the post to take warm care of its servicemen's living.
					
					 He gave a pair of binoculars, automatic rifle and machine gun to the post as gifts and had a photo taken with its servicemen.
					
					 The next leg of his inspection was the post of the third company of the second battalion under the unit.
					
					 He looked round the monument to the field guidance erected to convey the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to posterity.
					
					  He said with deep emotion that coming to his mind, visiting the post, was Kim Jong Il who visited the post during the Arduous March when the country was undergoing great difficulties.
					
					 He instructed the servicemen of the post to defend the post which is an eastern gate to the country as firm as an iron wall, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Going round a bed room, education room and mess hall, he said that there was nothing to spare for the servicemen on the forefront and it was necessary to make sure that the measures taken by the party pay off. He told the commanding officers to make redoubled efforts to provide the better living conditions to the servicemen.
					
					 He gave the post a pair of binoculars, an automatic rifle and a machine gun as gifts and had a photo taken with its service personnel.
					
					 He noted that the people of the DPRK can sleep in peace and the supreme commander feels rest assured as the service personnel of KPA Unit 171 are standing guard over the forefront as firm as an iron wall. He reposed the deepest trust in them, saying that the Central Committee of the WPK deeply trusts them. 
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Army Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Army Col. General Pak Jong Chon, vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Fire-Command Department.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Live-shell Firing Exercise of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Live-shell Firing Exercise of KPA Unit
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the live-shell firing exercise of KPA Unit 171.
					 He mounted an observation post to learn about the plan for the exercise and the deployment of multiple launch rocket systems before issuing an order to rapidly take up the designated firing position.
					
					 After closely watching the combat movement of service personnel through binoculars, he set the order, method and targets of firepower strikes and issued an order to open fire.
					
					 The moment the rocket systems roared, shaking the mountain ranges on the forefront line, reflecting the will of the KPA service personnel to annihilate the enemy and Hero Height 351 was enveloped in powder smoke reminiscent of a battlefield.
					
					 Shells dropped in the sea like hail, making huge columns of water soar.
					
					 Watching the columns of water rising in succession, he said with great satisfaction that the artillerymen are very good at firing and all of them are crack shots.
					
					  He highly appreciated the successful drill, noting that all the targets hit by the artillery pieces in the fire positions on the forefront represented the eruption of the KPA service personnel's burning hatred and their expression of the strong resolution to retaliate against the enemy. 
					
					 He stressed that he came to be convinced once again that all service personnel were only waiting for an offensive order from the supreme commander while keeping themselves highly alerted.
					
					 He said that the hostile forces are now getting more undisguised in their moves to isolate and stifle the socialist country but the Korean people can dynamically push forward the building of a thriving nation as the service personnel are defending the posts of the country as firm as an iron wall  with ardent patriotism.
					
					 He indicated the important tasks to be fulfilled by the units on the front to make more thorough-going combat preparations.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Army Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Army Col. General Pak Jong Chon, vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Fire-Command Department.

articles.title: Personal Message to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Personal Message to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a personal message from Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj.
					 The message was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday by Khaltmaa Battulga, member of the State Great Hural, who is the special envoy of the Mongolian president on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Special Envoy of Mongolian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Special Envoy of Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with special envoy of the Mongolian president Khaltmaa Battulga, member of the State Great Hural, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday. 
					 Present there were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economy, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, Manibadrakh Ganbold, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Special Envoy of Mongolian President
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Special Envoy of Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong had a talk with special envoy of the Mongolian president Khaltmaa Battulga, member of the State Great Hural, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK Minister of External Economy and Special Envoy of Mongolian President Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK Minister of External Economy and Special Envoy of Mongolian President Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economy of the DPRK, and special envoy of the Mongolian president Khaltmaa Battulga, member of the State Great Hural, were held here Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Hwang Min, vice-minister of Agriculture who is also chairman of the Livestock Management Committee in Sepho Area, and officials concerned and from the Mongolian side were the party of the special envoy of the Mongolian president, Manibadrakh Ganbold, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the issues of boosting economic and trade cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Israel's Military Attacks on Palestine
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Israel's Military Attacks on Palestine
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Tuesday in connection with the fact that Israel's reckless military actions have caused bloodshed again in Palestine:
					 Israel conducted a large-scale air raid against Gaza Strip by mobilizing dozens of fighters and copters while groundlessly linking the death of three young Israelis who went missing in June with Palestine. Since July 13 it has escalated the ground forces' attack. 
					
					 Israeli military attacks have so far claimed about 1 000 lives of Palestinians in Gaza Strip and leveled hundreds of public buildings and dwelling houses to the ground.
					
					 We bitterly denounce Israel's brutal killings of many defenseless Palestinians through indiscriminate military attacks on peaceable residential areas in Palestine as they are unpardonable crimes against humanity.
					
					 Upbeat under the patronage of the U.S., Israel is working hard to contain the resistance forces and create difficulties in the activities of the unified national government of Palestine through reckless military attacks, copying the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. in the international arena. But this is nothing but a pipe dream.
					
					 Israel should immediately stop all illegal military actions against Palestine and respond to the demand of the world peace-loving people including the Arab people for a comprehensive and fair solution to the Mid-east issue.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Koreans in Japan headed by Kwon Sun Hwi, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), left here on Tuesday.
					 Also leaving here on the same day were the delegation of officials of Chongryon and the delegation of elder officials of Chongryon.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in China Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Koreans in China Leave
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China and the delegation of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China left here Tuesday.
					 Earlier leaving here were the delegation of officials of the General Association of Koreans in China, delegation of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China, delegation of the Association of Korean Businessmen in China, delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City, China and delegation of the Aged Men Association in Shenyang City, China.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of Koreans in Russia left here.

articles.title: Lao Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Lao Ambassador Hosts Reception
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Tuesday to mark the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Laos.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Su Yong, foreign minister, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who is also chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 The Lao ambassador at the reception said that the two countries have supported and cooperated with each other in the struggle to build an independent and prospering new society against imperialism.
					
					 He noted that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation provided by President Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung have invariably developed under the wise leadership of the top leaders of the two countries over the past 40 years.
					
					 The two countries have deepened solidarity in international arena, he said, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative ties would grow stronger.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said that President Kim Il Sung rendered material and moral assistance to the Lao people in their anti-imperialist struggle for national liberation to achieve the independence of the country.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un had a historic meeting with Choummaly Sayasone who visited the DPRK and deepened the feelings of friendship and trust with him, a historic event which injected fresh energy into the development of bilateral relations, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK will make every possible effort to boost the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation in the idea of foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship, he said.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Visit Revolutionary Sites
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Visit Revolutionary Sites
						
 Changsong, July 15 (KCNA) -- Units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) started visit and study tour of the revolutionary sites associated with the feats performed by the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Attending there were exemplary service personnel of the KPA ground, naval, air and anti-air forces, cadets selected from military schools at each level and students from revolutionary schools.
					
					 A starting meeting of the KPA service personnel to visit the Changgol and Yuphyong revolutionary sites took place in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province on Tuesday.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the mosaics depicting the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Changsong township and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Om Hyang Chol, chairman of the KPA Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a speech there.
					
					 He said that through the visit all the service personnel should glorify the history and tradition of war victory by deeply grasping the exploits the President performed by winning the victory in the war and the fighting spirit of the army and people of the DPRK displayed in the 1950s.
					
					 At the end of the meeting service personnel visited the Changsong Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 And they made a study tour of the Changgol Revolutionary Site associated with undying feats the President performed by guiding an important meeting of the party and army there in October Juche 39 (1950) during the Fatherland Liberation War and bringing about a turning phase of the war.
					
					 On the same day the service personnel visited the Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of the Korean People's Army in Changsong County and paid silent tribute in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 They went round the Changsong Foodstuff Factory, Changsong Restaurant, Changsong Noodle House, etc. associated with the leadership exploits of the peerless great persons and appreciated a performance given by the members of the art group of the county at the Changsong County Hall of Culture.

articles.title: Scientific Successes Helpful to Fisheries Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Successes Helpful to Fisheries Made in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Branch Academy of Fishery in the DPRK has recently made a lot of scientific achievements conducive to developing the fishing industry.
					 The achievements include a 3-D map on fish ways in the West Sea of Korea and Tanphung 1.0, an aid program for forecast of catch state in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 Yon Chol, an official of the Academy, told KCNA: 
					
					 The 3-D map makes it possible to conduct the survey of fishing grounds and fishing on a more scientific basis. It is applicable to such various fields as survey and protection of aquatic resources, development of marine resources and environmental protection.
					
					 Tanphung 1.0 helps grasp the possible change of marine situation, the amount of main migrating fishes and their migration time and the situation of fisheries in an all-round way.
					
					 With the help of those programs, many fishery stations are now registering satisfactory results in fishing while consuming less fuel and materials.

articles.title: Another Little Master of Paduk Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Another Little Master of Paduk Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Another little master of paduk (go) has recently been produced in the DPRK.
					 It is Choe Jin Myong, a six-year old boy at the Sinwon Kindergarten in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, who came first in the children's paduk contest for the 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize in June.
					
					 Noting that the recent contest was high-level in view of scale and number of participants, Rim Hyon Chol, an official of the Pyongyang Paduk Centre, told KCNA:
					
					 The hopefuls were children who had career of 2-game or 3-game winning streaks.
					
					 Anyhow, Choe defeated all his rivals with splendid memory, correct judgment and flexible tactics. He is rapid in counting and strong in offensive spirit.
					
					 The course of this boy's contests stunned paduk experts including judges.

articles.title: Prevention of Flood Damage Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Prevention of Flood Damage Brisk in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Prevention of flood damage has been pushed ahead in all parts of the DPRK.
					 The Pongchon Coal Mine under the Kaechon Area Coal-Mining Complex has successfully finished the improvement of open drainage stretching a thousand and hundreds of meters.
					
					 The Ryongdae Coal Mine under the Sunchon Area Youth Coal-Mining Complex has speeded up a drainage project at the final stage.
					
					 Coal mines in Chonnae area of Kangwon Province and northern area of the country have installed pumps and pipes and laid pipes in pits on a massive basis.
					
					 The East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant has repaired coal yard and coal-conveying facilities.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways and railway branch bureaus in different parts of the country have been taking measures to prevent damage from landslide.
					
					 Large-scale construction projects, including the power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River, the stockbreeding base in Sepho area and the Kosan Fruit Farm have taken all necessary measures to prevent already-built structures from flood damage.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province rounded off more than 9 000 square meters of revetment project along 2.4 kilometers of road, repairing some 500 underdrains and overflow pipes and completing 500km-long road drains.
					
					 The province also finished 2 350m-long banking project against landslide as well as 3.2km-long afforestation for erosion control.
					
					 The Songchon County in South Phyongan Province carried out embankment project of the Piryu River in six months.
					
					 Farms across the country have pushed ahead with the improvement of drainages and preparations for operating pumps at full capacity, while taking full measures to prevent maize from storm damage.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Education in Juche Idea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Education in Juche Idea 
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 28th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea".
					 The work, published on July 15, Juche 75 (1986), indicates scientific accuracy, revolutionary character, originality and universality of the Juche idea and the most basic and principled matters to be steadily held fast to in the party ideological education. 
					
					 The publication of the work brought about a radical turn in the party's ideological work and consolidated in every way the politico-ideological position of the DPRK socialism, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Intensifying education in the Juche idea is an important requirement for increasing the power of the single-minded unity, mainstay of the Korean revolution, thousand-fold times and is an inevitable demand for training all the servicepersons and people into those strong in the idea and faith in socialism. 
					
					 It is also an important guarantee for dynamically pushing forward the ongoing drive for building an economic power. 
					
					 The Juche idea enshrines the revolutionary outlook on the leader to be cherished by the servicepersons and people at present as well as the ideological and mental traits to be kept by the frontline soldiers in socialist construction. 
					
					 The scientific outlook on the world that victory of socialism is the law governing the development of history, the belief that only socialism can help defend dignity, rights and the worthwhile life of the people and realize their happiness, the absolute conviction that Korean socialism will always emerge victorious as it is led by the great brilliant commander of Songun -- this is the revolutionary faith that has taken deep roots in the hearts of our servicepersons and people. 
					
					 The DPRK will shine forever as an invincible politico-ideological power, and the revolutionary cause of Juche will make a long victorious drive thanks to the great Juche idea and the wise leadership of the party.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts U.S. Espionage against Other Countries
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts U.S. Espionage against Other Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. National Security Agency has spied on 193 countries, according to the Washington Post.
					 This shows how recklessly the U.S. is resorting to power politics and arbitrary practices, and how arrogant and self-righteous it is, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the intention of the U.S. to deal merciless blows at any country rejecting its order for dominating the world, keeping a sharp watch on the world.
					
					 Considering itself as a special entity, the U.S. is now trying to put the world under its control, looking down on other countries of the world.
					
					 The U.S. is acting as it pleases, disregarding international law and norms governing the relations among countries.
					
					 No country would tolerate the high-handed politics, arbitrary practices, arrogance and self-righteous acts of the U.S. in the era of independence.
					
					 Many of the countries in the world are angered by the above-said arrogant practices of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is neither a special entity nor the country given the right to behave as it pleases.
					
					 All countries in the world are equal and the world does not exist in the U.S. but it is part of the earth.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently behaves like that, disregarding this hard reality, it is bound to meet international isolation and self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service Is Cancer-like Entity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service Is Cancer-like Entity: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed in south Korea that the Intelligence Service hatched all sorts of anti-DPRK plots and committed heinous human rights abuses, while operating the "joint newspaper center". This has sparked a big furor.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 The IS set up the center in 2008 under the pretext of investigating specified objects. It threw those who were caught in its claws into solitary cells under the pretext of "personal inquiries" without going through legal procedures and committed such shuddering atrocities as investigating them and resorting to violent acts and languages in wanton violation of human rights.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the sole aim sought by the IS coteries when operating the center was to produce "spies" who received instructions from the "north".
					
					 The spy case of the Seoul City public official whose falsity was brought to light last year was also fabricated in the center.
					
					 The south Korean people of different social standings are calling for investigating the case to the last.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that as long as the IS is allowed to remain, it is impossible to realize the nation's reconciliation and unity, the improvement of inter-Korean relations and the democracy of the south Korean society.
					
					 For the Korean nation, the IS is a cancer-like entity that should be removed at an early date, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Evade Responsibility for Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Evade Responsibility for Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- These days the president and heavyweights of the U.S. administration are noisily crying out for the DPRK's "dismantlement of its nukes", taking issue with its drills for launching missiles for self-defense, etc. 
					 They talk about advance measures for denuclearization and "strong international countermeasures", asserting in the international arena that the nuclear threats from the north and its missile development are attributable to the irresponsible policy and provocative attitude of its government and they do not recognize its access to nuclear weapons. 
					
					 This is nothing but a cynical ploy to lay the blame for the daily escalating tension on the Korean peninsula at the door of the DPRK, and mockery of the international community. 
					
					 It is clear to everybody that the reckless military moves of the U.S. and south Korea for a nuclear war are the main factor of the tension on the peninsula. 
					
					 On July 11 the U.S. suddenly hurled the flotilla of the nuclear carrier George Washington into Pusan Port of south Korea and the group of Aegis destroyer Kidd under the Third Fleet of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces into Tonghae Port of south Korea. It was reported that those groups would stage a "drill to intercept planes" accompanied by naval maneuvers targeted against the DPRK together with the south Korean naval force in the South and East seas of Korea from July 16. 
					
					 Posing constant nuclear threat to the DPRK and making high-handed nuclear blackmail against it, the U.S. is busy spreading the rumor that the responsibility for the escalating tension on the peninsula rests with the former and letting loose a whole string of sheer sophism that the world peace and security are threatened by the former's self-defensive nuclear deterrence and it should be, therefore, dismantled. As proved by the above-said facts, this behavior is like putting the cart before the horse.
					
					 The U.S. has neither justification nor right to blame the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK. 
					
					 Due to the U.S. moves for a nuclear war, south Korea and its vicinity have turned into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East and the advanced nuclear base for realizing the Asia strategy for aggression.
					
					 But for the U.S. deployment of nukes in south Korea and its nuclear threat to the DPRK, the Korean peninsula would have been nuclear free already long ago. 
					
					 The DPRK was the only zone of nuclear vacuum in Korean peninsula and its vicinity in which the U.S. stockpiled nuclear weapons enough to reduce the earth to nuclear debris dozens of times and its forces were always ready to invade it. 
					
					 It was the final conclusion made by the DPRK that it could counter those who wield nukes against it with nukes only. 
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to have access to nukes to foil the U.S. adventurous moves for a nuclear war and protect the security of the nation and peace on the peninsula and in the rest of Asia. 
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the danger of a nuclear war posed to the peninsula unprecedented in history, blinded by its ambition for world domination. 
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the army and people of the DPRK on the U.S. hostile policy towards it to counter the U.S. nuclear blackmail with a merciless nuclear attack, the war of aggression with a just total war. 
					
					 The U.S. should think twice with reason and make a bold decision to find a fundamental solution.

articles.title: Japan's Bid to Exercise "Right to Collective Self-defense" Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Bid to Exercise "Right to Collective Self-defense" Denounced in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- 228 organizations and 321 personages from all walks of life in south Korea held a meeting on the situation in Seoul on July 10 to check Japan's bid to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" and defend the peace in Northeast Asia, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News. 
					 Speakers at the meeting said that Japan's bid to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" is nothing but the declaration that Japan is a state able to fight a war and will threaten international peace and actually combat. 
					
					 Japan may find the way out in a war to tide over its economic crisis, they said, calling upon people from different social standings to turn out in the all-people movement for checking Japan's bid to exercise the "right to collective self-defense". 
					
					 A joint declaration was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities have connived at Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", the declaration said, demanding they clarify the opposition stand on this occasion and stop the moves to conclude a military agreement with Japan as a practical measure. 
					
					 It expressed the will to create public opinion opposing the "right to collective self-defense" and boost the joint action with the peace-loving forces in Japan.

articles.title: Japan's Farce to Commemorate Foundation Day of "Self-Defense Forces" Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Farce to Commemorate Foundation Day of "Self-Defense Forces" Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a one-man demonstration and press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on July 11 denouncing the farce of commemorating the foundation day of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces".
					 The Japanese embassy side held the farce in the embassy as its plan to hold it at a deluxe hotel in downtown Seoul was withdrawn, the organization said, and went on:
					
					 The farce is aimed to make a fait accompli the revelation of the Japanese government's militarist nature to deny the past war for aggression, distort the past history, allow the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" through the reinterpretation of the Pacifist Constitution and thus take the road of war and reinvasion, and justify it.
					
					  The Korean peninsula is set as the first target of Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", increasing the danger of reinvasion.
					
					 The organization urged Japan to cancel and stop the farce though belatedly.

articles.title: Japan's Farce to Commemorate Foundation Day of SDF Denounced
articles.content:
Japan's Farce to Commemorate Foundation Day of SDF Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking Japan's Exercise of the "Right to Collective Self-defense" of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 11 to denounce the ceremony of commemorating the foundation day of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces", according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News. 
					 The organization said at the press conference that the farce of commemorating the day of SDF, successor to the "Imperial Japanese Army" which mercilessly killed compatriots, slated in Seoul, not in Tokyo is an insult to the Korean nation. 
					
					 It said that it could not repress the indignation at the fact that the farce was being held at the Japanese embassy in secrecy. 
					
					 This is nothing but a declaration of war, the organization said, urging the Japanese embassy side to clarify the list of those invited and stop the farce at once.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Sewol Sinking Disaster Demanded
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Sewol Sinking Disaster Demanded
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster and the Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on July 12 and demanded the south Korean authorities probe the truth behind the disaster, according to Jaju Minbo, an internet newspaper of south Korea.
					 What the families of victims wish is not money but the probe into the truth behind the disaster, punishment of those responsible for it and the building of a safe society, speakers said, and went on:
					
					 There is a rumor that families of the victims want compensation, which gives impression that parents of the victims want a windfall at the cost of their children.
					
					 Parents put on their children's clothes, socks and shoes as they want to feel the odor of their children, saying that they want to know who killed their children.
					
					 Querying the "government" why it does not reveal the criminals, the speakers demanded the institution of a special law for the probe into the truth behind the Sewol disaster, punishment of those responsible for it and the safety of society.

articles.title: Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Support Statement of DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in their statements supported the statement of the DPRK government calling for weathering the difficulties facing the nation, improving the north-south relations and opening a new epochal phase of independent reunification.
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said the statement of the DPRK government reflected the iron will, immensely noble patriotism and spirit of national independence of Marshal Kim Jong Un who regarded it as the noblest mission to carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted Koreans in Osaka would dynamically join in the nationwide struggle to usher in the second June 15 era, holding high Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the lodestar of reunification.
					
					 Ko Tok U, chairman of the Nishi Tokyo Headquarters of Chongryon, expressed the will to devote his enthusiasm to the nationwide struggle to open an epochal phase of the sacred cause of reunification, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Chun Gwon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the statement of the DPRK government reflected the steadfast will and resolution of the DPRK government to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification at any cost.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, demanded the south Korean authorities stop the treacherous acts and honestly accept the statement of the DPRK government from the stand that if the Koreans pool their efforts, there is no problem insolvable.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Admires Reality of DPRK
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Admires Reality of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A Korean in the U.S. posted an article titled "Nice people in beautiful country" on his website on July 10.
					 The news that early peaches harvested in the north this year were supplied to commercial networks, baby home, orphanage and home for the aged in Pyongyang deeply moved people, the article said.
					
					 In capitalist society one usually thinks that only the rich have the chance to taste early fruits, it noted, adding: But the north sent those fruits to the baby home, orphanage and home for the aged before any place else.
					
					 The politics of human love is steadily enforced in the homeland thanks to the peerless great men and that's why people are creating happiness, revering and following them, it said.
					
					 I love my beautiful homeland, the DPRK where such fruits are associated with loving care and people feel the worth working, and the country of single-minded unity, the article concluded.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting and photo exhibition took place in Uganda and book and photo exhibition in Peru on July 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the immortal exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were famous works of the peerless great men and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The acting secretary general of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, the chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers lauded the President as the great master of ideology who founded the Juche idea and ushered in a fresh phase of accomplishing the cause of global independence, genius of the military affairs who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and elder statesman of the world who built socialism centered on the popular masses in Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche-based Songun Policy said that he admired the DPRK which is prospering as it holds the great leaders possessed of the outstanding ideology, theories and leadership ability and the heroic fighting spirit displayed by the Korean people in socialist construction.
					
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru praised the President as the benevolent father of the people, close teacher of the world socialists and resolute anti-imperialist fighter.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Personages of Uganda, Tanzania and Angola
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Personages of Uganda, Tanzania and Angola
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Uganda, Tanzania and Angola from July 3 to 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said that the President performed the immortal exploits in building a thriving socialist nation, reunifying Korea independently and peacefully and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 He said that though the President passed away, the ideological and mental assets provided by him for the Korean people and world progressive humankind would be everlasting.
					
					 The secretary general of the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association noted that the President's career was the shining one for the country, people and the cause of global independence and he is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive humankind for his exploits.
					
					 An official of Huambo Province, Angola said the President performed great exploits for the human cause of independence as a prominent politician recognized by the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Serbian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Serbian Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, issued a statement on July 7 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He said:
					
					 The Korean people and world progressive humankind are boundlessly revering the President who made great contributions to the country's reunification, prosperity of the nation and sacred cause for global independence all his life.
					
					 Though the President passed away, he is being deeply revered by all people as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 The President, the most outstanding leader of the 20th century and legendary great man, performed immortal feats for the times and history, possessed of iron will, matchless grit and noble personality.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of progressive mankind as the sun of Juche as he devoted his whole life to global independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Russian papers dedicated special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung from July 3 to 9.
					 Pravda Primoriya edited an article titled "Eternal sun" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 The President is always alive in the hearts of humankind as the eternal sun.
					
					 He illuminated the road ahead of humankind with the sunny light, provided the flower garden of human love and took care of all people with his great attraction.
					
					 Whoever had the honor of being received by him was fascinated by him. Though he passed away, his idea and cause are shining forever like the sun.
					
					 The Korean people made sure that he lies in state at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 Selskaya Zhizn carried an article titled "The outstanding leader of the 20th century" illustrated a photo of the President finding himself among soldiers.
					
					 It said that the peerless great man achieved the great exploits on behalf of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, holding aloft the banner of Juche and Songun.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in DR Congo, Nigeria, Thailand and Indonesia from June 27 to July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The minister of Labor of Yobe State, Nigeria said that the President whom the Korean people are holding in high esteem as their eternal leader built the DPRK, the people's country, the first of its kind in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5 000 years, and invincible socialist fortress unfazed by all storms and challenges of history.
					
					 The director of the Mariners' Ship and Commerce Co. of Thailand noted that the President is always remembered by the Korean people and progressives for the exploits he performed by dedicating his whole life to the freedom and happiness of people, reunification of the country and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The director and vice-director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia said they keenly realized once again that the President is the great man boundlessly revered by all people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place by Russian party and organizations on July 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the Party for Peace and Unity, the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung, the Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works and the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity said:
					
					 The President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and founded the Juche idea to embody it in the revolution and construction. He is the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He was tested and farsighted state political activist as he defended and developed the DPRK and socialism.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of progressives as great teacher.
					
					 A member of the Executive Committee of the party praised the President as a distinguished statesman and a very humble man, adding: All those who were honored to be received by the President were attracted by his sunny smile, noble traits and personality as a great man.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory noted that reverence of the Russian people for the President remains unchanged even after two decades since his demise.
					
					 Messages to supreme leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Visit DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Visit DPRK Missions
						
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and international and regional bodies and personages of different circles visited DPRK missions on July 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included governments, political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia, China, Mongolia, Nepal, Romania, Britain, Italy, France, Germany, Sweden, Mexico, Peru, DR Congo, Angola, Uganda, Ethiopia and Guinea, the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, personages of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and Juche idea study organizations and the participants in the regional internet seminar on the great President Kim Il Sung and the independent development of Africa. They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and full-length portraits of them and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Floral baskets were sent to the DPRK embassies by the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar, the Workers' House and a marine industrial organization and diamond company of Iran, the general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, chairpersons of the Democratic Party, the chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, the chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran and the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes and indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and preserving their idea and exploits and eternally glorifying them.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 3.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Russia and Germany and lectures in Dominica and Venezuela on July 6 and 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea praised the President for his immortal exploits on behalf of the country, nation and humankind.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany stressed that the world people are admiring the undying feats the President performed through his lifelong dedication to the people.
					
					 The secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica lauded the President as an outstanding man whom no other great man can match in ideology, leadership and traits.
					
					 The chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chief of the Venezuelan Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted with appreciation that the President embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, founded the immortal Juche idea, defeated the formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialist enemies, built the socialist power of independence, self-sustenance and self-defence and made great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Messages to supreme leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Germany, Dominica and Venezuela.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona puestos de unidad 171 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona puestos de unidad 171 de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el puesto de la policia civil subordinado directamente a la unidad 171 del EPC y el puesto de la compania no. 3 del batallon no.2 de esta unidad que defienden la primera linea del frente.
					Primero, el Comandante Supremo recorrio el puesto de la policia civil de la unidad.
					
					Viendo en el puesto de vigilancia la posicion enemiga frente a este puesto escucho detalladamente el informe sobre el estado de los enemigos.
					
					Evaluo altamente que los militares del puesto estan totalmente dispuestos al estado de movilizacion normal del combate.
					
					Subrayo que en la base de la victoria de la revolucion coreana estan impregnados los trabajos y el patriotismo de los militares de la linea avanzada que defienden con firmeza la linea de defensa de la patria frustrando las maquinaciones de los reaccionarios internos y externos.
					
					Diciendo que son los patriotas los militares del puesto quienes despliegan en todas estaciones el arduo combate de confrontacion contra los enemigos, ordeno fortalecer mas el servicio de guardia de la linea avanzada del frente conforme a la demanda de la situacion actual sin olvidar ni un momento la expectativa del partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Destaco que los militares del puesto deben prepararse con mas firmeza tanto en lo ideo-politico como en lo militar-tecnico capaces de aniquilar de un golpe cualquier agresion inesperada de los enemigos.
					
					Para este fin, es importante armar con la conciencia clasista antiimperialista y antiyanqui guardando profundamente la fe en la victoria y optimismo de la causa socialista, enseno.
					
					Al recorrer el cuartel, el comedor y el deposito diario del puesto atendio cordialmente la vida de los militares.
					
					Dio como recuerdo al puesto el binoculo, el fusil automatico y la ametralladora y se fotografio junto a los militares.
					
					Acto seguido, inspecciono el puesto de la compania no.3 del batallon no. 2 de la unidad.
					
					Vio el monumento en memoria de visita de orientacion construido para transmitir eternamente las hazanas realizadas por los grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu.
					
					Dijo que le viene a la mente la imagen del Dirigente quien visito este puesto en la epoca de la Marcha Penosa en que la patria sufria las arduas vicisitudes.
					
					Agrego que los militares del puesto deben defender con firmeza el puesto, puerta este de la patria en pleno acato al noble proposito del Dirigente.
					
					Recorriendo el cuartel, la sala de educacion y el comedor anadio que no hay nada que escatimar para los militares de la linea avanzada del frente y agrego que los comandantes deben esforzarse por sacar efecto las medidas tomadas por el partido y ofrecer a los soldados las mejores condiciones de vida y servicio militar.
					
					Dio como recuerdo al puesto el binoculo, el fusil automatico y la ametralladora y se fotografio junto a los militares.
					
					Dijo que los habitantes duermen tranquilamente y el Comandante Supremo tambien se siente seguro porque los oficiales y los soldados de la unidad 171 del EPC defienden como una muralla de acero la linea avanzada del frente y agrego que el CC del PTC confia con mas firmeza en ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Jong Chon, subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC y director de mando de fuego.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de canoneo de unidad 171 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de canoneo de unidad 171 del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de canoneo de la unidad 171 del EPC.
					Se entero en el puesto de vigilancia del plan de entrenamiento y el estado de ubicacion de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados y ordeno ocupar pronto la posicion de fuego indicada.
					
					Luego de ver con binoculos los movimientos de los militares, el Comandante Supremo definio el turno, el metodo y el blanco de fuego y dio la orden de disparo.
					
					Al momento tronaron en los montes de la linea avanzada los canonazos y la cota heroica 351 habia envuelto por el humo de canoneos, mientras aparecieron en el mar las columnas de agua.
					
					Viendo las columnas incesantes de agua, el se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que los artilleros dispararon bien y todos son tiradores celebres.
					
					Los canonazos tronados en las posiciones de fuego de la linea avanzada son el estallido de la colera e intolerable venganza de los oficiales y soldados del EPC a los enemigos, senalo y evaluo altamente que los ejercicios se hayan realizado con exito.
					
					Anadio que a traves de los ejercicios volvio a convencerse de que todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC esperan la orden de ataque del Comandante Supremo manteniendo el estado de alta alerta.
					
					Aunque se tornan mas abiertas las maquinaciones de las fuerzas hostiles tendentes a aislar y aplastar la patria socialista, el pueblo coreano acelera con vigor la construccion de un Estado prospero, porque ellos defienden con firmeza los puestos de la patria con el ardiente patriotismo, destaco.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan para hacer perfectamente los preparativos del combate de las unidades del frente.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Jong Chon, subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC y director de mando de fuego.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con enviado especial de presidente mongol y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con enviado especial de presidente mongol y su comitiva
						
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 15 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el enviado especial del presidente de Mongolia Khaltmaa Battulga, miembro del Gran Hural del Estado y su comitiva quienes le hicieron una visita de cortesia.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Ri Kil Song y otros funcionarios, el embajador Manibadrakh Ganbold y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica de Mongolia en Corea.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre Ri Ryong Nam y Khaltmaa Battulga
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre Ri Ryong Nam y Khaltmaa Battulga
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 15 en esta capital las conversaciones entre el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Ryong Nam, y el enviado especial del presidente de Mongolia Khaltmaa Battulga, miembro del Gran Hural del Estado.
					En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana el viceministro de Agricultura y presidente del Comite de Administracion Ganadera de la Zona de Sepho, Hwang Min y otros funcionarios y por la parte mongol la comitiva del enviado especial del presidente mongol, el embajador Manibadrakh Ganbold y otros miembros de la embajada de Mongolia en Corea.
					
					En las conversaciones fueron abordados los temas de desarrollar mas la cooperacion economica y comercial entre ambos paises.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia ataque israeli contra civiles palestinos
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia ataque israeli contra civiles palestinos
						
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que se reportan otra vez en Palestina los derramamientos de sangre debido a las imprudentes acciones militares de Israel, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 15 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					Hace poco, aparecieron en cadaveres 3 adolescentes israelies que reportaron desaparecidos en junio pasado. Al vincular este caso con Palestina sin motivos justos, Israel lanzo el ataque aereo contra la zona de Gaza movilizando decenas de aviones de combate y helicopteros y a partir del dia 13, intensifica el ataque incorporando hasta las fuerzas terrestres. 
					
					Despues del inicio de ataque hasta la fecha, reportaron en Gaza mas de mil palestinos muertos y lesionados y se redujeron a cenizas cientos de edificios publicos y viviendas. 
					
					Calificando de intolerable crimen de lesa humanidad, denunciamos fuertemente el indiscriminado ataque militar de Israel contra los poblados pacificos de Palestina, el cual causo la muerte de numerosos civiles inermes.
					
					Israel, envanecido bajo el amparo de EE.UU., intenta doblegar a las fuerzas insurgentes con el imprudente ataque militar imitando al imperio, que practica el despotismo y arbitrariedades en la arena internacional, y generar dificultades en las actividades del gobierno unido nacional de Palestina. Pero esto es una ambicion irrealizable.
					
					Israel debe parar de inmediato todas sus acciones militares ilegales contra Palestina y aceptar la demanda de los pueblos arabes y otros pacifistas del mundo por la solucion comprensiva e imparcial del problema del Medio Oriente.
